title: Classical Chinese Poetry
summary_en: A collection of classical Chinese poetry with annotations and appreciation.
summary_zh: 收录古典诗词作品，包含注释和赏析。
best_quote_en: The beauty of Chinese poetry lies in its concise yet profound expression.
best_quote_zh: 中国诗词之美在于其言简意赅而意境深远。

title: Thyroid Function Decline Syndrome Basic Diagnosis and Treatment Guidelines (Practice Edition 2019)
title_zh: 甲状腺功能减退症基层诊疗指南（实践版2019）
summary_en: Clinical practice guidelines for the diagnosis and treatment of hypothyroidism at primary care level.
summary_zh: 基层医疗机构诊治甲状腺功能减退症的临床实践指南。
best_quote_en: Early diagnosis and standardized treatment are crucial for managing hypothyroidism.
best_quote_zh: 早期诊断和规范治疗对甲状腺功能减退症的管理至关重要。

title: CSDN Technical Blog Article
summary_en: A technical blog post discussing programming or IT-related topics on CSDN platform.
summary_zh: CSDN平台上讨论编程或IT相关话题的技术博客文章
best_quote_en: Sharing technical knowledge helps advance the developer community.
best_quote_zh: 技术知识分享有助于推动开发者社区进步

title: CMT Endocrine Network Article
summary_en: A medical article about endocrinology published on CMT medical platform.
summary_zh: CMT医学平台发布的内分泌学相关医学文章
best_quote_en: Advancements in endocrinology research contribute to better patient care.
best_quote_zh: 内分泌学研究进展有助于改善患者治疗

title: 我喜欢的网站
summary_en: A book introducing various interesting websites.
summary_zh: 一本介绍各类有趣网站的书籍。
best_quote_en: The internet is full of hidden gems waiting to be discovered.
best_quote_zh: 互联网上充满了等待被发现的好东西。

title: 文章标题
summary_en: English summary of the article content
best_quote_en: Most notable English quote from the article
best_quote_zh: 文章中最值得引用的中文句子

title: 臣服实验-迈克·A辛格
summary_en: A memoir by Michael A. Singer about surrendering to life's flow and the unexpected journey that followed.
summary_zh: 迈克·A·辛格关于向生命之流臣服的自传，记录随之而来的非凡人生旅程。
best_quote_en: "The surrender experiment is about letting go of personal preferences and allowing life to unfold naturally."
best_quote_zh: “臣服实验的本质是放下个人好恶，让生命自然展开。”

title: Haruki Murakami | 67 Selected Quotes from 'What I Talk About When I Talk About Running'
title_zh: 村上春树 |《当我谈跑步时，我谈些什么》经典语录（67条）
summary_en: A curated collection of 67 profound quotes from Haruki Murakami's memoir 'What I Talk About When I Talk About Running', revealing the author's philosophy on writing, running, and life persistence.
summary_zh: 精选村上春树回忆录《当我谈跑步时，我谈些什么》中的67条深刻语录，展现作家关于写作、跑步与人生坚持的哲学。
best_quote_zh: 「痛楚难以避免，而磨难可以选择。」
author: 需补充文章编者/记者

book_info.original_title: 走ることについて語るときに僕の語ること

book_info.title: The Stronger Mindset
book_info.summary_en: A comprehensive guide to developing a stronger mindset, exploring the psychological principles and practical techniques for mental resilience and personal excellence.
book_info.summary_zh: 一本关于培养强者思维的全面指南，探讨心理韧性和个人卓越的心理原则和实践技巧。
book_info.best_quote_en: "The strong mind is not born, but forged through consistent practice and disciplined thinking."
book_info.best_quote_zh: 「强者思维不是与生俱来的，而是通过持续实践和自律思考锻造出来的。」
book_info.author: 需补充作者
